name: backbone-web-components
description: Set of layout helpers using Web Components

scripts.test: npm run build && npm run build:babel-test && wct
scripts.format: find src test | grep '\.js$\|\.ts$' | xargs clang-format --style=file -i
scripts.prepare: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.clean: rm -r ts3.4 components && rm backbone-web-components.js backbone-web-components.d.ts backbone-web-components.d.ts.map backbone-web-components.js.map
